raw_body: GOONEWARDENE – AVIS NINETTE (nee GERREYN) – Safe in the Arms of our Dear Lord on 21st September 2023 at Castle Hill NSW,​ Australia. Beloved wife of the late Douglas,​ loving mother of Daphne,​ Christopher and Romayne (Dec.),​ mother-in-law of Frank Soertsz,​ loving sister of Daisybelle Othen,​ Kingsley (Sonny),​ Dolores Wait,​ Alistair (Pinky,​ (All dec) and Pamela Blake (Canada),​ Desmond (Sydney) & Russell (Perth),​ loving grandmother to Natalie,​ Michael,​ Karina,​ Gareth,​ Damon & Jordan & to her great grandchildren. A Funeral Service will be held at the Wesley Uniting Church,​ Showground Road,​ Castle Hill,​ NSW on Friday,​ 29th September,​ 2023 at 10.00 a.m. followed by a private cremation. In lieu of flowers,​ a donation to The Cheshire Home,​ 17,​ Siripala Road,​ Mt. Lavinia,​ would be appreciated.061011
